attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to celebrate our ugly orange Cheeto and once i downloaded it i was met with a bunch of old boomers. they made a giant circle around my house and started chanting in some witch voodoo language after about 1 minute my house started to disintegrate and everything inside it was destroyed🤬🤬 like i said MY LIFE HAS BEEN DESTROYED!!!
attributes.title: this app has destroyed my life

attributes.review: I got this app just this morning and it will load of about 20 seconds then just tern the screen black and close out of the app I’m not having this issue with any other apps and I’ve shut down my phone to try to fix it overall probably base a bug
attributes.title: App won’t start

attributes.review: This app is horrible Apple actually let this slide! I don’t understand why would you vote Trump 2020 he is racist.  He doesn’t understand is that America is a melting pot so there’s from Africa, Mexico , Asia and so much more. America is for everybody not just people are white and come from Europe and speak English. and Trump is very disrespectful.
attributes.title: This app should be taken down

attributes.review: DO NOT download this app, it is extremely dangerous for your health and well-being. It all started on the first day I downloaded the app. Slowly, I noticed that my fingers and toes were turning orange. For the next 3 days, the orange 🍊 color made its way to every limb and now I am completely orange. There is no cure and I will be stuck the way FOREVER.
attributes.title: I am now ✨🧚🏻‍♀️orange✨🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: I tried to order a cat through this app but it wouldn’t let me how disgraceful I should be allowed to do that in this app. And the customer service Is just terrible I tried to order a cat through there but karen was too worried about blue lives matter like when did smurfs come to life??
attributes.title: Worst possible service

attributes.review: Terrible app the worst I’ve ever had this app is so bad that I can’t even fathom how anyone would be able to keep on this app the layout is so bad that I don’t know where anything is and it to the point where you have to go through 4 or 5 different screens just to go to certain spots of the app.
attributes.title: Name Jeff app

attributes.review: This app took a week and a half to download, and while it was downloading it wouldn’t let my phone turn off. Then, when it finally was downloaded my phone got a virus, disgusting! I would not recommend this app to anyone, unless they enjoy having viruses on their phone.
attributes.title: Horrible!!

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. My WiFi is working perfectly and my device in completely new. After finally getting the app to download the app kept glitching and I would see a orange with a mouth and eyes. This was supposed to be professional, I am very disappointed. Do not download
attributes.title: Do not Download!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help me understand our president and his views for our future in hopes of a good outcome but instead i had a meltdown because of the atrocity i came across this app affected my mental health in a way that i may never recover from i plead that this app get taken off of the apple store as soon as possible
attributes.title: My heart aches with disapproval

attributes.review: At first I was very excited to get this app and support my beloved Bunker Boy, but when I opened the app and began the sign up process, I was discriminated on multiple fronts. It first asked my gender. When I said that I was a woman, it asked if I was “on my period aka mentally sane”. Then I said that I was bisexual and it led me to a conversion therapy site. -10/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: Sexist and Homophobic
